argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumneg.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumneg.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | isumneg.3 | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | isumneg.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 5 |  | isumneg.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | isumneg.6 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 7 | 5 | #P_mulm1d | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( -u 1 x. A ) = -u A ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> -u A = ( -u 1 x. A ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_sumeq2dv | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z -u A = sum_ k e. Z ( -u 1 x. A ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_1cnd | |- ( ph -> 1 e. CC ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_negcld | |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. CC ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 11 | #P_isummulc2 | |- ( ph -> ( -u 1 x. sum_ k e. Z A ) = sum_ k e. Z ( -u 1 x. A ) ) |
| 13 | 3 | #P_mulm1d | |- ( ph -> ( -u 1 x. sum_ k e. Z A ) = -u sum_ k e. Z A ) |
| 14 | 9, 12, 13 | #P_3eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z -u A = -u sum_ k e. Z A ) |
